channel.title: About the Optimization category
channel.description:
This is a category for discussing performance and optimization ideas.
Though remember the very important **Rules For Optimizations (at least, the Ones Make Code Less Clear)**:
# Rule #1: Don't do it.
# Rule #2: (Experts only!) Don't do it...yet.
